name: Colossus
description: When rolling damage for a weapon wielded with two hands, treat all 1s and 2s rolled as 3s.

name: Bullwark
description: Reduce all Physical damage you take by 2.

name: Tail
description: You grow a reptilian tail. It is a natural weapon that has 10-foot reach and deals d12 damage.

name: Horns
description: You grow a set of horns. They are a natural weapon that deal d10 damage.

name: Retribution
description: Whenever a creature deals melee damage to you, you may deal d4 Fire damage to them.

name: Sunblade
description: Whenever you deal damage with a melee weapon you may change the damage type to Fire.

name: Stoneskin
description: Reduce all Air, Earth, Fire, and Poison damage you take by 2.

name: Toxic
description: Whenever you deal melee damage that leaves a creature Unwarded you may Poison that creature.

name: Keen-Eyed
description: The range of your ranged weapons and ranged weapon skills are increased by 15 feet.

name: Wayfaring
description: You are unaffected by difficult terrain.

name: Nimble
description: Your movement doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks and your attacks don’t provoke counterattacks.

name: Duplicitous
description: When wielding two light weapons, your off-handed weapon deals its main-hand damage.

name: Frigid
description: Your Strikes and Skills deal an additional d6 Water damage to Chilled targets.

name: Moonblade
description: Whenever you deal damage with a melee weapon you may change the damage type to Water.

name: Zephyr
description: Your speed is increased by 10 feet.

name: Voltaic
description: Reduce all Water and Air damage you take by 2. You are immune to being Shocked.

name: Blazing
description: When rolling fire damage, treat any 1s and 2s rolled as 3s.

name: Rekindling
description: Whenever you deal fire damage you regain half that much health.

name: Terramorph
description: Once per turn, when you deal Earth damage to a creature, you may reduce their movement by 5 until the end of their next turn.

name: Serpentine
description: If you would take poison damage, heal that much instead.

name: Rejuvination
description: Whenever you roll dice to restore a creature’s Health or Ward, treat any 1s and 2s rolled as 3s

name: Frostbitten
description: Whenever you Freeze a creature, deal 1d10 Water damage to it.

name: Stormseeker
description: Once per turn, when you deal Air damage to a creature, you may fly up to half your movement.

name: Repulsor
description: Whenever you deal Air damage to a creature you may push it up to 10 feet away from you.

name: Larger than Life
description: You grow 1 foot taller and can carry twice as much.

name: Heavy Handed
description: You can wield any two weapons at once. When wielding one or more two-handed weapon in one hand your Strikes take an additional action.

name: Barbarian
description: Your melee weapons deal +1 damage.

name: Panthera
description: You grow feline fangs, they are a natural weapon that deals d8 damage.

name: Covert
description: Your Strikes and Skills deal +d6 damage to targets who can’t see you.

name: Sanguine
description: Your skills and weapons that would make a target Bleed if Unguarded make them bleed regardless of Guard.

name: Monastic
description: Your body is a natural weapon that deals 2d6 damage.

name: Typhon
description: You grow irridescent scales. Your heart beats faster, your blood flows pitch. Your movement is increased by 5 feet.

name: Angelic/Demonic
description: You sprout a pair of fiery wings. You gain a fly speed equal to your walk speed.

name: Stonechosen
description: You have tremorsense out to a distance of 60 feet and you can strike unarmed for d8 Earth damage.

name: Lupus
description: You can effortlessly conjure fiery claws. Your dominant hand deals d6 Fire damage and your non-dominant hand deals d4.

name: Fire
description: You grow crimson and golden scales and gain 50% Fire resistance.

name: Depth Strider
description: You sprout gills and grow webbing between fingers and toes. You can breathe underwater and gain a swim speed equal to your walk speed.

name: Octopodal
description: You can effortlessly conjure watery tentacles. They count as natural weapons that deal d8 Water damage. They have Reach and damaging a target with them makes it Wet.

name: Wind Blessed
description: Whenever you use an Air skill you may fly up to half your speed immediately, without provoking opportunity attacks.

name: Ice
description: You grow white and silver scales and gain 50% Water resistance.
